mapper.select: SELECT qno, qtt, name, today FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rno, brd.* FROM (SELECT qno, qtt, name, qna.today today FROM qna, member WHERE member.memno = qna.memno AND qna.qshow = 'Y' ORDER BY today desc) brd ) WHERE rno BETWEEN #{startCont} AND #{endCont}
SELECT COUNT(*) totalCount FROM qna WHERE qshow = 'Y'
SELECT name FROM member WHERE memid = #{SID}
SELECT qtt, qip, TO_CHAR(today, 'yyyy/MM/dd') today, name, memid FROM qna q, member m WHERE qno = #{qno} AND q.memno = m.memno
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna(qno, qtt, qip, memno) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(qno)+1,1000)FROM qna), #{qtt}, #{qip}, (SELECT memno FROM member WHERE memid = #{memid}) )
mapper.update: UPDATE qna SET qshow = 'N' WHERE qno = #{qno}
UPDATE qna SET qtt = #{qtt}, qip = #{qip} WHERE qno = #{qno}
